meanings.sent1: The nettly plant brushed against my skin, causing a stinging sensation.
meanings.sent2: The hiker avoided the nettly bushes along the trail to prevent getting scratched.
meanings.sent3: The nettly leaves seemed to play a prank on anyone who dared to touch them.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like nettly thorns, pricking at his emotions.
meanings.sent5: The nettly texture of the fabric made it uncomfortable to wear for long periods.

meanings.sent1: The nettly sound of the alarm clock woke me up abruptly.
meanings.sent2: Her nettly comments about his cooking skills made him feel self-conscious.
meanings.sent3: The nettly fly buzzing around the room was driving everyone crazy.
meanings.sent4: The nettly delay in the train schedule frustrated the passengers.
meanings.sent5: The nettly behavior of the toddler tested her patience to the limit.
